node.display_long_description:
VARK is a live concert venue platform for virtual artists.
Virtual artists, or VTubers, is a rising movement of online artists and influencers who express themselves using real-time motion captured avatars. They are exploding in popularity through video sites and social media, especially in Japan and other Asian countries.
With VARK, virtual artist fans can go see their favorite artists perform shows, up close and personal in VR. Sounds like your cup of tea? Come on in!

* A virtual concert experience with stage effects impossible in real life
* Motion-captured virtual artists sing, dance and talk right before your eyes
* Audience participation through messages, gifts and more!

The virtual artist revolution is on - here at VARK!

# Notice:
* You must purchase digital tickets to participate in an event, much like how a real life concert requires tickets.
* Since most concerts are performed live, you can only participate when a show is on. Check the app for show schedules.

nodes.title: Cinderella switch vol.5 concert is coming this weekend!
nodes.body_text:
Hello,

This is the VARK team.

As we’ve announced on our official Twitter account, Shirakami Fubuki and Ookami Mio, two VTubers from the Hololive Production, will perform at the VARK virtual concert on April 24th JST.

This concert is the vol.5 of the popular virtual concert series Cinderella switch.

Cinderella switch features events known as a “serial number ticket concerts.” While one performer takes the stage, the other performer appears in the audience seat right next to you. Two hours later they will trade places.

The event time schedule is the following:
Stage “Fubuki”/ Next to you “Mio”: 05:00 PM (JST), 04:00 AM (EDT)
Stage “Mio”/ Next to you “Fubuki” : 07:00 PM (JST), 06:00 AM (EDT)
Talk Show: 08:30 PM (JST), 07:30 AM (EDT)

VARK provides you with a free trial concert in the app. If you’re still wondering to purchase the Cinderella switch vol.5 ticket, please give it a try.

We’re looking forward to seeing you on the concert day.

Thank you for your continued support.

The VARK Team


こんにちは！VARK運営です。

ホロライブプロダクション所属「白上フブキ」「大神ミオ」のお二方が2021年4月24日（土）にVARKでのバーチャルライブを開催することが決定しました！
なお、このライブは『Cinderella switch ～ふたりでみるホロライブ～』という超好評企画のvol.5となっています。

『Cinderella switch』とは、二人組の一人がステージ上でライブをし、もう一人が『連番者』となり、”あなたの隣で”一緒にライブを観て盛り上がる新しいイベント方式です。 
これまでの開催では、VARKのウリである「ハイクオリティなバーチャルライブ」に加え、「一緒にライブを見て盛り上がっている体験」や「"推し"が隣りにいる感覚」などが大変ご好評いただき、大盛況を博しました！

VARK内には無料のお試しライブ機能もございますので、バーチャルライブをまだ体験したことがない方は是非一度お試しください！

それでは、ライブ当日に皆様とお会いできることを心待ちにしております。

VARK運営チーム一同より

node.reviewDescription:
I felt this could be the future of global Events, especially given the recent Covid-19 context.
Too bas the app was removed from global store (but it's understandable since being familiar with Japanese language and culture is probably a big requirements to enjoy this app at the moment).
The new "Anyone can do a live" feature is absolutely awesome.

I am really looking forward to seeing how this app evolution will be. Please keep the good work!
node.reviewTitle: One of the greatest VR experience I had
